Text:
Thanks! But why THE PHUCK .mkv?? Does .avi suck that bad? Cool shit, and thanxs but next time .avi, mnkaaay??
:D

thanx a lot pal... I'm a big fan of westerns & nothing compares to the oldies.... 
even though we have all the gadgets etc. now but still V just can't make any western like the old ones..
great job... kudos to you pal... 
Keep 'em coming.... 
really appreciate it...

avi is OK, MKV has slightly better clarity with lighter encoding MOST of the time (not always). I know .mkv can be difficult but the encoding on this one allows it to be played on ".avi friendly" players like the KMPlayer, with the addition of the combined community codec pack: http://www.cccp-project.net/ Even us card carrying commie pinkos like a fine western classic now and again!
